attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think we should scrap British Summer Time (BST) and just get used to living with GMT throughout the year.

If there are concerns or problems about driving conditions due to lighting conditions then we should just adapt our working hours and not mess around with the clock.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
